workflow.name: Document Q&A system with OpenAI GPT, Pinecone Vector DB & Google Drive integration
workflow.description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

# ü§ñ AI-Powered Document QA System using Webhook, Pinecone + OpenAI + n8n

This project demonstrates how to build a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using n8n, and create a simple Question Answer system using Webhook to connect with User Interface (created using Lovable):

üßæ Downloads the pdf file format documents from Google Drive (contract document, user manual, HR policy document etc...) 

üìö Converts them into vector embeddings using OpenAI

üîç Stores and searches them in Pinecone Vector DB

üí¨ Allows natural language querying of contracts using AI Agents

## üìÇ Flow 1: Document Loading & RAG Setup
This flow automates:

Reading documents from a Google Drive folder

Vectorizing using text-embedding-3-small

Uploading vectors into Pinecone for later semantic search

### üß± Workflow Structure
  A [Manual Trigger] --> B[Google Drive Search]
  B --> C[Google Drive Download]
  C --> D[Pinecone Vector Store]
  D --> E[Default Data Loader]
  E --> F[Recursive Character Text Splitter]
  E --> G[OpenAI Embedding]

#### ü™ú Steps
Manual Trigger: Kickstarts the workflow on demand for loading new documents.

Google Drive Search & Download

Node: Google Drive (Search: file/folder)

Downloads PDF documents

#### Apply Recursive Text Splitter: Breaks long documents into overlapping chunks
Settings:
Chunk Size: 1000
Chunk Overlap: 100

#### OpenAI Embedding
Model: text-embedding-3-small
Used for creating document vectors

#### Pinecone Vector Store
Host: url
Index: index
Batch Size: 200

#### Pinecone Settings:
Type: Dense
Region: us-east-1
Mode: Insert Documents

## üí¨ Flow 2: Chat-Based Q&A Agent
This flow enables chat-style querying of stored documents using OpenAI-powered agents with vector memory.

### üß± Workflow Diagram

  A[Webhook (chat message)] --> B[AI Agent]
  B --> C[OpenAI Chat Model]
  B --> D[Simple Memory]
  B --> E[Answer with Vector Store]
  E --> F[Pinecone Vector Store]
  F --> G[Embeddings OpenAI]

### ü™ú Components
Chat (Trigger): Receives incoming chat queries

AI Agent Node

#### Handles query flow using:

Chat Model: OpenAI GPT

Memory: Simple Memory

Tool: Question Answer with Vector Store

Pinecone Vector Store: Connected via same embedding index as Flow 1

Embeddings: Ensures document chunks are retrievable using vector similarity

Response Node: Returns final AI response to user via webhook

## üåê Flow 3: UI-Based Query with Lovable
This flow uses a web UI built using Lovable to query contracts directly from a form interface.

### üì• Webhook Setup for Lovable
Webhook Node

Method: POST
URL:url
Response: Using 'Respond to Webhook' Node

### üß± Workflow Logic
  A[Webhook (Lovable Form)] --> B[AI Agent]
  B --> C[OpenAI Chat Model]
  B --> D[Simple Memory]
  B --> E[Answer with Vector Store]
  E --> F[Pinecone Vector Store]
  F --> G[Embeddings OpenAI]
  B --> H[Respond to Webhook]

### üí° Lovable UI
Users can submit:

Full Name
Email
Department
Freeform Query: User can enter any freeform query. 
![image.png](fileId:1715)
Data is sent via webhook to n8n and responded with the answer from contract content.

### üîç Use Cases
Contract Querying for Legal/HR teams

Procurement & Vendor Agreement QA

Customer Support Automation (based on terms)

RAG Systems for private document knowledge

### ‚öôÔ∏è Tools & Tech Stack
![image.png](fileId:1714)

üìå Final Notes
Pinecone Index: package1536

Dimension: 1536

Chunk Size: 1000, Overlap: 100

Embedding Model: text-embedding-3-small

Feel free to fork the workflow or request the full JSON export.
Looking forward to your suggestions and improvements!

workflow.name: AI-Powered Document QA System using Webhook, Pinecone + OpenAI + n8n

parameters.content:
## Document Loading 
1. Connect to Google Drive folder to access Contract Agreement Documents
2. Download and Vectorize the Data using Vector Embedding 
3. Store in Pinecone Database

options.systemMessage:
*Role*
You are a highly experienced contracting, commercial and legal adviser who thoroughly understands the contract related to shipping, clearing and forwarding agreements and advise and reply to chat queries looking into the pinecone vector database and respond accordingly. 

**Instructions**
you will receive chat query to which you have to reply back in chat
you will only look for information in the pinecone vector databse
you will not create your own reply if you don't get the answer from the database

Note:
be polite and professional in your response
can use emojis where it is appropriate

nodes.name: Answer questions with a vector store

parameters.description: When ever there is a query from chat, use this pinecone vector database to analyse and construct the response.

parameters.content: ## Query document from a user interface connectied via Webhook

parameters.content:
This project demonstrates how to build a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using n8n, which:
üßæ Downloads any pdf file format documents from Google Drive
üìö Converts them into vector embeddings using OpenAI
üîç Stores and searches them in Pinecone Vector DB
üí¨ Allows natural language querying of contracts using AI Agents

## Document Loading & RAG Setup
This flow automates:
Reading documents from a Google Drive folder
Vectorizing using text-embedding-3-small
Uploading vectors into Pinecone for later semantic search

### üß± Workflow Structure
A [Manual Trigger] --> B[Google Drive Search]
B --> C[Google Drive Download]
C --> D[Pinecone Vector Store]
D --> E[Default Data Loader]
E --> F[Recursive Character Text Splitter]
E --> G[OpenAI Embedding]

### ü™ú Steps
Manual Trigger: Kickstarts the workflow on demand for loading new documents.
Google Drive Search & Download
Node: Google Drive (Search: file/folder), Credentials required to access google drive folders and files
Downloads PDF documents from the google drive

#### Recursive Text Splitter to Break long documents into overlapping chunks
Settings:
Chunk Size: 1000
Chunk Overlap: 100

#### OpenAI Embedding
Model: text-embedding-3-small
Used for creating document vectors

#### Pinecone Vector Store
Index: package1536
Batch Size: 200
Settings:
Type: Dense
Region: us-east-1
Mode: Insert Documents

## Quyerying the Documetn via Chat 
This flow enables chat-style querying of stored documents using OpenAI-powered agents with vector memory.

### üß± Workflow Diagram
  A[Webhook (chat message)] --> B[AI Agent]
  B --> C[OpenAI Chat Model]
  B --> D[Simple Memory]
  B --> E[Answer with Vector Store]
  E --> F[Pinecone Vector Store]
  F --> G[Embeddings OpenAI]
### ü™ú Components
Chat Trigger
AI Agent Node

Handles query flow using:
Chat Model: OpenAI GPT
Memory: Simple Memory
Tool: Question Answer with Vector Store
Pinecone Vector Store
Connected via same embedding index as Flow 1 Embeddings
Ensures document chunks are retrievable using vector similarity
Response Node
Returns final AI response to user via chat response

## üåê Flow 3: UI-Based Query with webhook connecting to Lovable
This flow uses a web UI built using Lovable to query contracts directly from a form interface.

### üì• Webhook Setup for Lovable
Webhook Node
Method: POST
URL: your webhook url
Response: Using 'Respond to Webhook' Node

### üß± Workflow Logic
  A[Webhook (Lovable Form)] --> B[AI Agent]
  B --> C[OpenAI Chat Model]
  B --> D[Simple Memory]
  B --> E[Answer with Vector Store]
  E --> F[Pinecone Vector Store]
  F --> G[Embeddings OpenAI]
  B --> H[Respond to Webhook]

### üí° Lovable UI
Users can submit:
Full Name
Email
Department
Freeform Query

Data is sent via webhook to n8n and responded with the answer from contract content.

### üîç Use Cases
Contract Querying for Legal/HR teams
Procurement & Vendor Agreement QA
Customer Support Automation (based on terms)
RAG Systems for private document knowledge

‚öôÔ∏è Tools & Tech Stack
Component	Tool Used
AI Embedding	OpenAI text-embedding-3-small
Vector DB	Pinecone
Chunking	Recursive Text Splitter
AI Agent	OpenAI GPT Chat
Automation	n8n
UI Integration	Lovable (form-based)
